name: The Gannet
description:
For #minijam50 - an island creation myth featuring divinity and a sea bird.

Use the ARROW KEYS to move. Use the UP ARROW to maintain conversations.

Submitted incomplete to make the jam deadline, but will be finished some time during the next two weeks! You can easily tell where I started running out of time. If you are motion sensitive, please put on a warm screen filter before you enter the first door to make the "wallpaper" there less disorienting. This is something I intend to fix in the final release, so please take care.

Thank you for playing ♥
